attributes.action: get all MEP's to reveal their expences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just like the British Members of Parliament have been made to reveal their expenses I believe this should include all Members of the European
Parliament. Make this compulsory to bring any creditability back to the European Parliament.

rejection.details: This is outside the powers of the PM and UK Government. We suggest you contact the European Parliament or your local MEP directly with your concerns.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
